content.title: Mukhya mantri Krishak Udyami Yojana
content.department: Department of Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises
content.details: The Mukhya Mantri Krishak Udyami Yojana provides loans up to ₹ 50,000 to ₹10,00,000 for financial assistance to the sons and daughters of farmers to establish their businesses. Economically weak farmers will be able to become self-reliant by setting up their businesses and their weak economic condition will not become a hindrance to their progress. Under this, 15% of the capital cost will be provided to the general category, and 20% of the capital cost will be provided to the BPL (Below Poverty Line) category.
benefits: For projects worth Rs 10 lakh or more: 15% for general class (maximum ₹12,00,000), 20% for BPL category (maximum ₹18,00,000), 6% interest subsidy for women entrepreneurs, 5% for male entrepreneurs.

For projects less than Rs 10 lakh: 15% of the project cost (maximum ₹1,00,000) for the general category, 30% of the project cost (maximum ₹2,00,000) for BPL/scheduled caste/scheduled tribes/other backward classes/women/minorities/disabled.
30% of the project cost (maximum ₹3,00,000) to the liberated nomadic and semi-nomadic tribes.
Bhopal Gas victim family members are eligible for an additional 20% (maximum ₹1,00,000) on the project cost.
eligibility: The applicant must be a permanent resident of Madhya Pradesh.
The age of the applicant should be between 18 to 45 years.
Educational qualification should be a minimum of 10th class.
The parents of the beneficiary should not have their agricultural land.
The applicant should not be an income taxpayer.
content.application_process: Step 3: Various departments associated with the scheme will be displayed. Choose the department that interests you. Step 4: Choose the option for registration or sign-up if you are a new application. Click the submit button after entering your name, mobile number, password, and captcha code. Step 5: After submitting, you will be registered on the portal. Step 6: Now, you can log in to the portal and apply for the scheme.

faqs.question: What is Mukhya Mantri Krishak Udyami Yojana (MMKUY)?
faqs.answer: Mukhya Mantri Krishak Udyami Yojana is a government scheme aimed at promoting entrepreneurship and providing financial assistance to farmers for setting up agro-based enterprises.

faqs.question: Who can apply for Mukhya Mantri Krishak Udyami Yojana?
faqs.answer: Farmers who wish to start agro-based enterprises are eligible to apply for MMKUY.

faqs.question: How does Mukhya Mantri Krishak Udyami Yojana help farmers financially?
faqs.answer: MMKUY provides financial assistance to farmers in the form of subsidies, loans, grants, or other incentives to help them establish their agro-based enterprises.

faqs.question: What is the minimum educational qualification required for the scheme?
faqs.answer: Applicant must have passed minimum 10th class.

faqs.question: What will be the age criteria?
faqs.answer: The age of the applicant should be between 18 to 40 years as of the date of application.

faqs.question: How does Mukhya Mantri Krishak Udyami Yojana contribute to rural development?
faqs.answer: MMKUY contributes to rural development by empowering farmers to become self-reliant entrepreneurs, thereby creating employment opportunities and boosting the rural economy.

faqs.question: Which is the official website of the Mukhya Mantri Krishak Udyami Yojana?
faqs.answer: This is the official website for the Mukhya Mantri Krishak Udyami Yojana in Madhya Pradesh, https://msme.mponline.gov.in/

faqs.question: How many times can the applicant avail of the benefits of the scheme?
faqs.answer: The applicant will be eligible for assistance under this scheme only once.
